note:
arson.

"In order for me to write poetry that isn't political,
I must listen to the birds,
And in order to listen to the birds,
The warplanes must be silent"

this beautiful poem by Marwal Makhoul really embodies my feelings about politics, so if you find my profile "too political" piss off. we must talk about politics for as long as politics are the matter of life and death.

"the only entity known to science that successfuly had a rat-to-bug transition" -- @mahiwa@big.mahiwa.monster (I found the cure to the gregor samsa affliction™)
"discount Heavenly Possum" -- @untyped@insufferable.tools
"fuck you, leftoid hypocrite" -- @metalrunner@pol.social
"poseł na sejm, więzień polityczny" -- @wasikmaciej@birdsite.xxx
"decorum albo wpierdol" -- @AubreyDeLosDestinos@101010.pl

step on me and i shall viciously bite yer ankles.

(new account of szczur@akko.hollow.capital. can't migrate -- it doesn't exist.)

fields.name: approves of:
fields.value: queer rights, sex work, anarchism, activism, bodily autonomy, Taoism, punching fash in the face

fields.name: disapproves of:
fields.value: nationalism, chauvinism, limiting freedom of others, centralised religion, the supreme Ethnostate of Zion and its lackeys (so if you're one, fuck off)
